description: [``botocore``] Added the ability to add items to response metadata with the stubber.
[``botocore``] Update sts client to latest version
[``botocore``] Update route53 client to latest version
[``botocore``] Default to virtual hosted addressing regardless of signature version (boto/botocore`#1387 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/issues/1387>`__)
